story.name: Raising Awareness
story.content: {"_uid":"c478e513-b8e2-48f1-b6df-6bf40506c0f3","body":[{"_uid":"4c1719e9-5847-4ca4-b351-ba2730521940","title":"RAISING AWARENESS.","component":"hero","hero_image":{"id":null,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},"button_text":"","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"From leaving our business card in a shop, to climbing a mountain for ANDYSMANCLUB, there are so many ways you can make a difference and help us spread the message that #ItsOkayToTalk.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"474cc583-0d44-4a7c-a103-f2195660ceea","image":{"id":4709339,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/555x825/a4a5158d56/support-our-charity-370x550.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"SUPPORTING US","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"IT’S NEVER BEEN ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"A BETTER TIME TO ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"SUPPORT A CHARITY","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"LIKE US.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"With suicide rates soaring in the UK, and the bulk of those being male, its never been a better time to support a charity like ANDYSMANCLUB.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"We only exist because of the fantastic support of people like you. There’s been so much terrific work in our communities with a a core focus of encouraging men to talk about their problems and challenges, and spreading the #ITSOKAYTOTALK hashtag. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"We want you to know we value all the time and support you give us, everything you do to raise awareness heightens our chances of getting in front of #ThatOneMan who needs us at the right time, and ultimately, saving lives.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"two-column-text-image","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-black","black_background":true},{"_uid":"3569a03a-85e9-49c1-b2e4-8860497dc5fd","items":["4bb2a7ea-f9e2-4439-80b7-1b729ba3589f","64f30a81-642a-4e4d-b757-ddd6462f4cd3","6bd1e6d7-76f2-4393-864c-fafb45539175","d4913e0d-737d-43fd-8c15-dc2a2a9b5ed1","a22ce652-893b-43bb-a2a2-441deef31236","b8a5c024-4713-42b9-ba62-d5a5ab1b02c4","3b376000-b121-4627-bdc0-9f0f97daf1fc","409a1ea4-bc49-43f0-a7a9-c9864f76b8cd"],"label":"WHAT OTHERS HAVE TO SAY","component":"testimonials","button_text":"See another story","background_color":"bg-white","black_background":false,"button_functionality":true},{"_uid":"d29ef3ed-331b-454a-bb48-db16e858f6df","image":{"id":4954188,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/2000x1500/ef2fe734e7/join-the-movement-1000x750.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"JOIN THE MOVEMENT","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"AND HELP RAISE VITAL","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"AWARENESS.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Help raise vital funds for ANDYSMANCLUB so we can continue our mission to get men talking and challenge the stigmas around male mental health. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"There’s lots of ways you can help support and raise awareness for us and we’ve seen an immense amount of support over the years. Incredible supporters running, walking and swimming marathons, climbing mountains, organising football matches in support of us, skydiving and hosting music events. The list goes on. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"Whatever way you’d like to raise awareness, we’ll support you all the way. For any enquiries regarding raising awareness ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"contact us","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"/contact-us","uuid":"0dffdc40-c98c-4848-aa22-662494d0fedc","anchor":null,"target":"_self","linktype":"story"}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":" today to see how we can help. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"simple-center-branded-with-image","button_text":"CONTACT
